mapper.select: /* 공통메세지 목록 조회 */ SELECT CM.MESSAGE_ID , CM.MESSAGE , CM.COUNTRY_CODE FROM COUNTRY_MESSAGE CM INNER JOIN MESSAGE_GROUP MG ON MG.MESSAGE_ID = CM.MESSAGE_ID AND CM.COUNTRY_CODE = #{locale} AND MG.USE_YN <> 0
mapper.insert: /* 공통 메세지 그룹 생성 */ INSERT INTO MESSAGE_GROUP ( MESSAGE_ID, USE_YN, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( UPPER(#{vo.messageId}), 1, #{vo.creatorId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP(), #{vo.updaterId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP() )

/* 공통 메세지 생성 */ INSERT INTO COUNTRY_MESSAGE ( MESSAGE_ID, COUNTRY_CODE, MESSAGE, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE ) VALUES ( UPPER(#{vo.messageId}), #{vo.countryCode}, #{vo.message}, #{vo.creatorId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP(), #{vo.updaterId}, UTC_TIMESTAMP() )
mapper.select:
/* 메세지 목록 */ SELECT MG.MESSAGE_ID AS MESSAGE_ID , KO.MESSAGE AS KO_MESSAGE , ENG.MESSAGE AS ENG_MESSAGE , MG.USE_YN AS USE_YN , IFNULL(U.NICKNAME, '') AS UPDATER_NAME , MG.UPDATE_DATE AS UPDATE_DATE FROM MESSAGE_GROUP MG INNER JOIN COUNTRY_MESSAGE KO ON KO.MESSAGE_ID = MG.MESSAGE_ID
AND MG.MESSAGE_ID = UPPER(#{vo.messageId})
AND MG.USE_YN = #{vo.useYn} AND KO.COUNTRY_CODE = 'KO' INNER JOIN COUNTRY_MESSAGE ENG ON ENG.MESSAGE_ID = MG.MESSAGE_ID
AND KO.MESSAGE = CASE WHEN KO.COUNTRY_CODE = #{vo.locale} THEN #{vo.message} ELSE KO.MESSAGE END AND ENG.MESSAGE = CASE WHEN ENG.COUNTRY_CODE = #{vo.locale} THEN #{vo.message} ELSE ENG.MESSAGE END
AND ENG.COUNTRY_CODE = 'ENG' LEFT JOIN `USER` U ON U.USER_ID = MG.UPDATER_ID
/* 메세지 중복체크 */ SELECT COUNT(1) FROM MESSAGE_GROUP WHERE MESSAGE_ID = UPPER(#{messageId})
